actionCalls.description: Action to send the email notification based on prior information in flow/loops.
actionCalls.name: Send_Email_Notification
actionCalls.label: Send Email Notification

actionCalls.description: Sends custom notification to mobile for the recalled Serialised Product.
actionCalls.name: Send_Mobile_Notification
actionCalls.label: Send Mobile Notification

actionCalls.description: Action to send desktop notification based on prior information in flow/loops.
actionCalls.name: Send_Recall_Notification
actionCalls.label: Send Recall Notification

assignments.description: Adds the Serialised Product row to the templates.
assignments.name: Add_Individual_Details
assignments.label: Add Individual Details

assignments.description:
Adds assigned_product_transfer to collection in order to update Serialised Product as recalled.
Adds assigned_note to collection in order to create notes on recalled Serialised Products.
assignments.name: Add_to_Collections
assignments.label: Add to Collections

assignments.description: Adds recordId to Product Collection variable.
assignments.name: Add_to_Product_Collection
assignments.label: Add to Product Collection

assignments.name: Add_User_Id_Assign_Headers
assignments.label: Add User Id and Assign Headers

assignments.description: Assigns the reason to the final comments variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Variables
assignments.label: Assign Variables

assignments.description: Assigns Product to recordId variable and reason to finalRecallComments variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Variables_Global
assignments.label: Assign Variables

assignments.description: Remove all assignments so that the loop can be refreshed.
assignments.name: Reset_Assignments
assignments.label: Reset Assignments

collectionProcessors.description: Filter Serialised Products to notify user of all Serialised Products they own.
collectionProcessors.name: Filter_Serialised_Products
collectionProcessors.label: Filter Serialised Products

decisions.description: Checks if the User has been looped.
decisions.name: Check_If_User_Already_Looped
decisions.label: Check If User Already Looped

decisions.description: Checks the Product user invoked the flow from is active.
decisions.name: Check_Product_Is_Active
decisions.label: Check Product Is Active

decisions.description: Checks if any Serialised Products were found which are still active.
decisions.name: Check_Serialised_Products_Found
decisions.label: Check Serialised Products Found

decisions.description: Checks if all permission set Ids were located, and also if the user has a permission set assignment for any of the permission sets.
decisions.name: Permission_Set_Assignment_Check
decisions.label: Permission Set Assignment Check

decisions.description: Checks to see if the flow was invoked from a quick action or global action.
decisions.name: Quick_Action_or_Global_Action
decisions.label: Quick Action or Global Action?

decisions.description: Decision to check that the recall was confirmed.
decisions.name: Recall_Confirmed
decisions.label: Recall Confirmed?

decisions.description: Checks to see if product name or manufacturer was left blank, amends search for products accordingly.
decisions.name: Search_Decision
decisions.label: Search Decision

Flow.description: Flow that allows a user to issue a recall for all Serialised Products that fall under the Product record. To be used with Compliance Stores solution.
Flow.label: Compliance Stores - Recall

loops.description: Loops through the found Serialised Products.
loops.name: Loop_Active_Serialised_Products
loops.label: Loop Active Serialised Products

recordCreates.description: Creates the recall note for the Product Item.
recordCreates.name: Create_Recall_Note
recordCreates.label: Create Recall Note

recordCreates.description: Create Records to add notes to all recalled Serialised Products.
recordCreates.name: Create_Serialised_Product_Notes
recordCreates.label: Create Serialised Product Notes

recordLookups.description: Get Records to find all Serialised Products linked to the recalled Product record.
recordLookups.name: Get_Active_Serialised_Products
recordLookups.label: Get Active Serialised Products

recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Stores_Product_Record_Type
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Stores Product Record Type

recordLookups.name: Get_Compliance_Team_Permission_Set_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Compliance Team Permission Set Id

recordLookups.description: Gets the custom notification for desktop/email.
recordLookups.name: Get_Custom_Notification_Type_Desktop_Email
recordLookups.label: Get Custom Notification Type (Desktop/Email)

recordLookups.description: Gets the custom notification for mobile.
recordLookups.name: Get_Custom_Notification_Type_Mobile
recordLookups.label: Get Custom Notification Type (Mobile)

recordLookups.name: Get_Matching_Product_Records_Product_Name_Only
recordLookups.label: Get Matching Product Records (Product Name Only)

recordLookups.name: Get_Site_Manager_Permission_Set_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Site Manager Permission Set Id

recordUpdates.description: Updates the product to show recalled, and to make inactive.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Product_to_Recall
recordUpdates.label: Update Product to Recall

recordUpdates.description: Update Serialised Products to show as recalled.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Serialised_Products
recordUpdates.label: Update Serialised Products

fields.name: ChooseProductRecallDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please choose the product below you wish to recall.

screens.description: Screen to confirm user wishes to recall the product.
screens.name: Confirm_Product_to_Recall
screens.label: Confirm Product to Recall

fields.name: ConfirmProductRecallDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please confirm you wish to recall the below product.

screens.description: Confirms to user that Product/Serialised Products have been recalled and notifications have been issued to return.
screens.name: Confirmation_Screen
screens.label: Confirmation Screen

fields.name: ConfirmationDisplay
fields.fieldText: The Product has been recalled and is inactive. The below Serialised Products have been recalled and owners have been notified:

fields.name: SearchProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please search for the product you wish to recall.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that they don't have the relevant permissions to run the flow.
screens.name: Failed_Permission_Set_Check_Screen
screens.label: Failed Permission Set Check Screen

fields.name: NotAuthorisedDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not authorised to issue a recall.


If you should have authorisation, please speak with your team leader/manager to request access.

screens.description: Confirms to user that the Product is already inactive.
screens.name: Inactive_Product_Chosen_Screen
screens.label: Inactive Product Chosen

fields.name: InactiveProductDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You are attempting to recall an inactive Product, no further action is required.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to the user that the system is missing permission sets, these need to be uploaded before the flow can be ran.
screens.name: Missing_Permission_Sets_Screen
screens.label: Missing Permission Sets Screen

fields.name: MissingPermissionSetsDisplay
fields.fieldText:
There are missing permissions in the system to check you are authorised. Please advise the system administrator of the below issue.


One of the below custom permissions are missing in the Salesforce system:


  • Compliance Team
  • Site Manager
  • Operational Safety Engineer

screens.description: Screen to confirm the Compliance Stores record type for Products is missing from the system.
screens.name: Missing_Product_Record_Type
screens.label: Missing Product Record Type

fields.name: MissingProductRecordTypeDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You cannot recall equipment at this time. Please advise the system of the below issue.


The below Record Type is missing from the Product object:


  • Compliance Stores

screens.description: Screen to advise user no matching products were found, Can choose to go back or to end the recall flow.
screens.name: No_Matching_Products_Found_Screen
screens.label: No Matching Products Found

fields.name: NoProductsFoundDisplayText
fields.fieldText: No products were found using the name/manufacturer entered. Please go back to amend your search details.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user they have not entered a Product Name or Manufacturer to search the system.
screens.name: No_Product_Name_Manufacturer_Screen
screens.label: No Product Name/Manufacturer Screen

fields.name: NoProductNameManufacturerDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You have not entered a Product Name or Manufacturer for search. Please go back and enter the details.

screens.description: Confirms to user Product has not been recalled.
screens.name: No_Recall_Screen
screens.label: No Recall Screen

fields.name: NoRecallDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You have chosen not to recall the item, this will remain active in the system.

screens.description: Screen to confirm to user that the product is now inactive, and there are no Serialised Products active and in use.
screens.name: Product_Recalled_Confirmation
screens.label: Product Recalled Confirmation

fields.name: ConfirmationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: The below product has now been recalled and is inactive.

textTemplates.description: Text template to email hold record details. Used in loop to gather details for email.
textTemplates.name: emailRecordDetails

textTemplates.description: Text template to hold email header. Used in loop to display context for email.
textTemplates.name: emailTableHeader
textTemplates.text: The below item(s) have been recalled, please return ASAP:

textTemplates.description: Text template to hold notification header. Used in loop to display context for notification.
textTemplates.name: notificationTableHeader
textTemplates.text: The below item(s) have been recalled, please return ASAP:

textTemplates.description: Hard coded JSON to direct notifications to a serialised product list view.
textTemplates.name: notificationTargetPage

variables.description: Text variable to hold the compiled email message from the loop.
variables.name: emailCompiledMessage

variables.description: Text variable to hold the compiled desktop notification message from the loop.
variables.name: notificationCompiledMessage
